attributes.additional_details: So schools can stop pushing this agenda on students where they all must have everything picture perfect. Instead like in America they should be allowed to wear their own clothes so they feel more comfortable.
attributes.background: To get rid of students having to wear uniforms in school and it being so strict with a dress code. If economic prejudice is the reason for uniforms just allow students to wear clothes that are not high fashion brands

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
